Glossary
********
.. glossary::

   CG
       `conjugate gradient <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Conjugate_gradient_method>`_

   DD 
       `discrete directions <https://www.nature.com/articles/nature16060>`_

   LBFGS
        limited-memory `BFGS <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Broyden%E2%80%93Fletcher%E2%80%93Goldfarb%E2%80%93Shanno_algorithm>`_

   ISTA
        iterative shrinkage/thresholding algorithm

   MITRA
       modular iterative tomographic reconstruction algorithm

   MOTR
       momentum total variation reconstruction

   RADTT
       robust and denoised tensor tomography

   SIGTT
       `spherical integral geometric tensor tomography <https://doi.org/10.1107/S205327332300863X>`_

   SAXS
        `small angle X-ray scattering <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Small-angle_X-ray_scattering>`_

   SAXSTT
        `small angle X-ray scattering tensor tomography <https://journals.iucr.org/a/issues/2018/01/00/vk5021/index.html>`_

   SIRT 
        `simultaneous iterative reconstruction technique <https://tomroelandts.com/articles/the-sirt-algorithm>`_

   SMOTR
       sparse momentum total variation reconstruction

   SPRADTT
       sparse robust and denoised tensor tomography

   STSIRT
       sparse tensor `simultaneous iterative reconstruction technique <https://tomroelandts.com/articles/the-sirt-algorithm>`_

   TV
       `total variation <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Total_variation_denoising>`_

   WAXS
        `wide angle X-ray scattering <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wide-angle_X-ray_scattering>`_
